pageContext.claim: “We're going to be very tough with them [the tech and social media companies]. They're treating conservatives very unfairly. … They treat conservatives and Republicans totally different than they treat others. And they can't do that.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is accusing tech companies such as Google and Twitter of suppressing conservative views and users, but there is no evidence for that claim. In some cases, Trump supporters have been banned from certain platforms for posting offensive content that violates the terms of service, not for espousing conservative views.
